com.camerontec.util.jmx

Class TLSCapableJMXConnectorServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseExecutableComponent
              • com.camerontec.util.jmx.TLSCapableJMXConnectorServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITLSCapableJMXConnectorServer, IExecutable, IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class TLSCapableJMXConnectorServer
extends BaseExecutableComponent
implements ITLSCapableJMXConnectorServer
    This bean wraps a JMX connector server and provides an alternative to Spring's ConnectorServerFactoryBean. The following extra features are supported:
    • The connector server factory can be provided with a JMXTLSServerProfile object specifying the TLS security settings to use in the connector server: see setSecurityProfile(com.camerontec.util.jmx.security.JMXTLSServerProfile).
    • The connector server can be enabled or disabled: see setEnabled(boolean)
    Author:
    Guillaume Jacob (guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com)
